metadata.name: Tints & Shades
metadata.description:
Yellow is the color between green and orange on the spectrum of light. 
Variations in value are also called tints and shades, a tint is a yellow (or other color) mixed with white, a shade - mixed with black. 

Also human skin has variations in color, but they are equal in value like races and cultures. Skin has undergone variations by simply adapting to climate including sunlight. 

This illustration encourages nations with different skin colors to be friends. And eat healthy lemons!
